bibl.title: Ad Fontes. Original Manuscripts and Their Significance for Studying Early Christianity. Selected Essays. (Texts and Editions for New Testament Study. 3.)
bibl.note: Reproduction ou traduction de 11 articles (1999-2004), avec des addenda de l'auteur, et 2 contributions inédites. - Pp. xi-xii: [Th.Kr.], Preface; - 1-12: 'Why am I Doing what I Do?' Introducing my Work on Manuscripts and Ordering the Essays According to Topics and Approach [contribution inédite]; - 261-272: Indexes.
